author: Tyto
description: A cog to run an autonomous Letta agent that can interact with users in a Discord server.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Aurora! This cog requires a self-hosted Letta server or Letta Cloud. Follow the Letta documentation here: https://docs.letta.com/overview

Please set your letta token using `[p]set api letta token,<your_token>`.
